content: this wash cloth is featured as week 4 of the 6 week learn to knit series with the pattern there is also a row by row checklist and a link to the video tutorial where i walk you through each step of knitting this project the final outcome is a lovely textured and useful wash cloth for the sample i used less than a skein of lilly sugar n cream yarn in the color swimming pool you can use any cotton yarn that you like however the pattern is written for the medium 4 weight yarn the pattern is written for an 8 5 x 8 5 cloth but is completely and easily customizable to adjust the width and length to any size that you like if you choose to make this project can you please show some love and link your project to this pattern page you can also tag me on social media with #handmadebystacyj i d love to see your makes stitches used knit purl and yarn over materials needed lilly sugar n cream yarn 100% cotton medium 4 weight 65 yards size 7 4 50mm knitting needles 2 stitch markers optional for keeping track of edging 1 lockable stitch marker for marking front of work tapestry needle and scissors
